Name: Riki
Bio: Riki was born middle child to the great dynasty of Tahlin. With an older brother groomed for the throne, and a younger brother coddled and kept, Riki, the small middle son, seemed born for the art of invisibility. It was an art he cultivated, and one which ultimately saved his life on the night that his people were betrayed and his family slaughtered. Of all the royal line, he alone escapedâ€”small and agile, unassuming, using smoke as cover. He cut his way out of the royal grounds, using the advantage of surprise, quietly slitting the throats of one enemy warrior after another. Now free of his royal responsibilities, Riki uses his talents in service to a new trade: Stealth Assassin. He silences his enemies, sharpening his skills, hoping to one day take revenge on those who killed his family and robbed him of his birthright

Abilities.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.
Abilities.notes: Doesn't prevent the use of active items.
Abilities.attribute:
RADIUS: 250 / 275 / 300 / 325
MISS RATE: 40% / 50% / 60% / 70%
MOVEMENT SLOW: 10% / 15% / 20% / 25%
DURATION: 6
Abilities.lore: Since his escape during the night of his betrayal, Riki has valued the use of a simple smoke screen to confuse his opponents.

Abilities.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.
Abilities.notes:
Riki's first attack after Blink Strike will be a backstab.
Blink Strike's damage is dealt before the next attack.
You can Blink Strike to allies, but no damage is dealt.
Abilities.lore: The Stealth Assassin's agile movement makes him impossible to escape.

Abilities.affects:
ABILITY: Passive
DAMAGE TYPE: Physical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: Yes
Abilities.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.
Abilities.notes:
Riki won't auto attack enemies while invisible.
Illusions of Riki will play Backstab animations, but not deal any bonus damage.
Bonus damage from Backstab can't be evaded.

Abilities.desc:
CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a 500 AoE once per second.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
Abilities.notes:
Attacks once when casted and once per second after that.
Moving while phased out will cancel the ability.
Abilities.attribute:
RADIUS: 500
MAX ATTACKS PER UNIT: 4 / 5 / 6
SCEPTER BONUS DURATION: 4
Abilities.lore: The Stealth Assassin is not afraid to fight dirty, and specializes in attacking his opponents from behind.
